headline: Bernstein Boosts Costco Wholesale Corporation (COST) Target, Sees Consumer Sentiment Still Soft
summary: Costco Wholesale Corporation (NASDAQ:COST) is included among the 13 Best Roth IRA Stocks to Buy Now. On February 9, Bernstein analyst Zhihan Ma raised the price target on Costco Wholesale Corporation (NASDAQ:COST) to $1,155 from $1,146 and maintained an Outperform rating. The firm said the fourth quarter places U.S. retail at a mixed point. Consumer […]
